title: We Reject the End of Summer: Vulture Festival Is Returning to Los Angeles
text:
Photo: Vulture

Hopefully you didn’t end your Labor Day weekend by flinging your sunscreen into the sea, because this year Vulture Festival is returning to Los Angeles. Why? Well, we’re not quite done with summer yet, and it just so happens that, in LA, you can party by the pool even when it’s November. So we’ll be doing exactly that, accompanied by what you might call an extravaganza of our pop culture favs. And it’s all happening at the beautiful Hollywood Roosevelt on November 9th and 10th. Lineup announcements are coming in October, so follow Vulture Festival on Twitter and Instagram for updates. Or, center your life around obsessively checking the festival’s website. That will keep you fully up-to-date on which of your favorite actors, writers, and musicians will be filling out our panels, cast reunions, live podcasts, and more. Because frankly, you cannot miss this year’s festival. It’s not allowed. We will cancel you.
description: The 2019 Vulture Festival is returning to the city of Los Angeles on November 9th and 10th, for a full weekend of panels, live podcasts, and more, with a pool-side party to boot.
